alert.note: Alert for Addison; Orange; Rutland; Washington; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 6:42PM EDT until July 13 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Orange County in central Vermont... Southeastern Addison County in central Vermont... Northeastern Rutland County in southern Vermont... Northwestern Windsor County in southern Vermont... Southwestern Washington County in central Vermont... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 642 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Granville to East Pittsford, moving east at 80 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Barre, Middlebury, Braintree Hill, Salisbury, Bethel, Lincoln, Randolph, Rochester, Chittenden, Granville, Goshen, Barre Town, Northfield Village, Hancock, Warren, Ripton, Northfield, Barre City, Roxbury, and Williamstown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
